## StreamEventHandlers interface

Event handlers for a stream subscription.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface StreamEventHandlers<TResponse> 
```

## Remarks

All handlers are optional. Register only what you need.

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[onComplete()?](./rtsk.streameventhandlers.oncomplete.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Called when the stream completes without errors.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[onError(error)?](./rtsk.streameventhandlers.onerror.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Called when the stream encounters an error.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[onNext(value)?](./rtsk.streameventhandlers.onnext.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Called for each hydrated message emitted by the stream.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[onStatusChange(status)?](./rtsk.streameventhandlers.onstatuschange.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Called whenever the controller status changes.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
